verses.name: Joshua 24:23
verses.text: Now therefore put away, said he, the strange gods which are among you, and incline your heart unto the Lord God of Israel.

verses.name: Joshua 24:24
verses.text: And the people said unto Joshua, The Lord our God will we serve, and his voice will we obey.

verses.name: Joshua 24:25
verses.text: So Joshua made a covenant with the people that day, and set them a statute and an ordinance in Shechem.

verses.name: Joshua 24:26
verses.text: And Joshua wrote these words in the book of the law of God, and took a great stone, and set it up there under an oak, that was by the sanctuary of the Lord.
